div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 760 Tenevo, c. 15 km. S of Jambol, Bul- garia, 1956 Burial: c. 330-320 B.C. (T) Contents: 150-200 AR. Pot hoard Apollonia Pontica: tetrob. Athens: tetradr. Parium: hemidr. Disposition: Jambol 6 Apollonia, 2 Athens, 37 Parium; Jambol coll. 2 Athens, 8 Parium Gerasimov, BIAB 22 (1959), p. 359
